ABOUT US


Mario production was launched in the year 2020 by our founder Mst. Odiachi Mario in other to help young entrepreneurs like himself to have a platform to advertise their goods and services. This gave to the birth of MARIO PRODUCTION .
Mario production is available to all business types to place any advert of their choice at a token price in order to maintain the website and update the webpage.
At mario production we ensure we give the BEST to our all our customers.

Mario production we deal with all forms of graphic designs such as

  1. Flyers
  2. Banners
  3. Id Cards
  4. Posters
  5. Logos
  6. Post Card / birthday cards
  7. Business Cards
  8. Web Development and Designs
  9. Album Covers and many more
